data.sentence: The word فَلَا comes from the root ل ا and is associated with the meanings:

data.meanings: to recite/read, compilation, collection, reading, recitation, explanation, study, investigation.
data.sentence: The word سَنُقْرِئُكَ comes from the root ق ر ا and is associated with the meanings: to recite/read, compilation, collection, reading, recitation, explanation, study, investigation.
The word تَنْسَى comes from the root ن س ي and is associated with the meanings: to forsake/forget/neglect, pretend to forget.
